name: Display Latest Feeds
author: Lougie Quisel

sections.description:
Display latest feeds from any RSS Feeds accounts. This is very helpful if you want to put to your blog the latest feed blog post of any site.

You can use [loq_feeds] shortcode in your post editor to be able to display the list of feeds in your post. There is also a widget available for this plugin. You can check it in the widget section.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
You can either install it automatically from the WordPress admin, or do it manually:

  1. Unzip the archive and put the loq-blog-feeds folder into your plugins folder (/wp-content/plugins/).
  2. Activate the plugin from the Plugins menu.

short_description: Display latest feeds to your blog from any RSS Feeds accounts.
